audioText: Ce programme donne un excellent exemple de collaboration internationale moderne et efficace.
question: Ce programme donne un excellent ______ de collaboration internationale moderne et efficace.
explanation: The text states 'Ce programme donne un excellent exemple de collaboration internationale moderne et efficace' - This program gives an excellent example of modern and effective international collaboration. 'Exemple' (example) is the correct noun, masculine singular with the indefinite article 'un'.
